Reviews.Title: Better than I thought
Reviews.Author: Herbert F.
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews of various TV/DVD combos my expectations were not high. Installed in the cabin of my BOAT. Complaints about low sound and statements such as, "you have to have the correct angle to view," lowered my expectations. Not with this model, if anything the sound even at the lowest setting is loud and the picture is viewable from nearly every angle. Have not yet tried out the DVD player. A must buy for the price compared to other 12V TV's.

Reviews.Title: great picture for the price
Reviews.Author: Erich Poole
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV as a gift for my dad to put in his 18 wheeler.  He said picture was outstanding and he was very satisfied.  He did say the sound was a bit low and he wishes it was a little louder.  At times it can be a LITTLE hard to hear over the idle truck but overall he is very pleased. We haven't used the DVD player yet but will update if for any reason it is not perfect.  Great features for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: L. D. Rafey "math'nmore"
Reviews.Content: Arrived in a timely fashion and well packaged. Easy to set up ... took longer to open the package than to set up ... almost a plug in and play. Absolutely great picture, outstanding sound (I had to turn it down and still got excellent sound even on its lower volumes). Lots of options.No lag on on/off. Remote works quite well all the way across the room. I don't actually need the DVD player in the kitchen but I might need it at some time in the future. So far, so good. Let's see how long it lasts.

Reviews.Title: Fits my space and needs perfectly!!!!
Reviews.Author: pat hunter
Reviews.Content: After doing some research on AC/DC DVD combos for size and pricing, I chose this one and it has matched my space, needs, quality and price range perfectly. I am very satisfied with this TV.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: clem
Reviews.Content: HAS A GREAT PICTURE, SOUND IS OK A LITTLE TINNY BUT IT`S OK JUST MY CAMPER. This SHOULD WORK OUT.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV for my Camper
Reviews.Author: Avo M.
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV/DVD unit. Remote control and picture quality looks elegant. I used it for one month already in my camper and so happy to have this unit with me. I recomend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great RV TV
Reviews.Author: H A Wollman
Reviews.Content: Its flexibility from ac to dc power makes this TV a perfect choice for your RV, camper, boat or motorhome

Reviews.Title: AWESOME PICTURE
Reviews.Author: kathy j kelly
Reviews.Content: we bought this for our boat... it is small light weight easy to install and use the diffedrent usb hdml etc and the picture is perfect. the only thing I was unhappy with is the sound.... not enough volume. but we had bose computer speakers we hooked up and it was fine. great tv for the price

Reviews.Title: SUPER FOR OUR RV!
Reviews.Author: C&J
Reviews.Content: We are completely satisfied with this little set!  The picture clarity is awesome, the unit is light, so hanging it on the side of a cabinet was accomplished without the need for extra reinforcement.  We bought the VideoSecu ML10B mount (it weighs more than the TV)that was recommended and it is great. We fold the TV flat against the end of a cabinet when not in use and the articulating arm lets it swing out and around the end of the cabinet when we want to watch.  You don't have to be staring straight at the screen for a good picture. The DVD player works well. My Techie son-in-law looked at it and said "wow! this thing has ports all over it". (We'll never use them all.)  The sound is OK even over the noise of the roof air. (it would be nice if it had better speakers, but it gets the job done) We thought about the 19" model, but space is a premium and this little set and its great picture gets it done in a BIG way, no regrets on this choice.We are using and old standard RV anntenna from the 80's with a built in signal amplifier and we get better reception than in our house. If the need arose, we would buy it all over again!

Reviews.Title: Nice low energy TV for my RV
Reviews.Author: Michael P. Boop
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased when I set up my RV with this new TV! It fit perfect in my Camper and the 12V system ran perfectly..It was so light I was able to hook it up on the inside of my oak cabinet door.. With the articulating arm I can set it up for viewing in the dinette area or up in the bed.. So far I love it!

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: R. Avera
Reviews.Content: TV works fine. its a bit of a pain to set up and you have to reset it every time to change locations but overall its a ok TV. My biggest complaint is viewing angle. you have to be almost level with the screen to see it correctly. either that or tilt it very far down to be able to see it correctly. Mine is mounted in a 18 wheeler about 3 ft above eye level. it has to be tilted down quite a bit to be able to see the picture fully. The DVD works fine. The remote works well.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Brandi Friend
Reviews.Content: This inexpensive TV is well worth the money. The picture is good and can be seen from most angles. However, the sound is a bit quiet when you're on the road. You don't notice when you're parked and watching TV, but when you're travelling on the road and trying to watch a movie, you have to turn the volume ALL the way up to hear the sound. Have not had this problem with other TVs.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture for a 15.6" flatscreen but the sound is unusually harsh.
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Schulman
Reviews.Content: The Axess TVD1801-15 15,6" flat screen provides an admirable picture with its 900 pixel display, but there are problems which prevent a five-star rating.  The Axess remote cannot be integrated with a learning remote so you will have to switch back and forth between the remote provided and the one from the cable company. Also, while on the remote subject the Axess unit control buttons seem to be made for left handed people with its  power and volume buttons situated to the left side.  Most importantly is the sound which is harsh, making one's ear drums pucker.  I found that placing a towel around the bottom of the integrated speakers helps reduce this unpleasantess.  Axess provides a number of software sound options, such as movie, standard, user etc.,along with base and treble controls, but the sound improves only minimaly when used.  By the way I have notice that sound quality is a major complaint for most small flat screen TVs.  Last the Axess TVD 1901-15 15.6 takes about 30 seconds or sligtly more to come to life.  No instant on here.  RICHARD G. SCHULMAN

Reviews.Title: Great little tv for the price.
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Francis "Harley dude"
Reviews.Content: This little set does a great job for an under cabinet tv in the kitchen.  The sound and viewing angle are decent and if you mount it on a tilt-down bracket, it folds up out of the way while not in use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent unit
Reviews.Author: Woodville Bluebird
Reviews.Content: I have only had the unit for a month, but it works very well in the limited space I have in the RV. It is lightweight, I mounted it on a hinge bracket so it can be angled for viewing. The travel vibration is minimal and the unit plays DVD's and CD's without skipping unless the road is really bumpy. Power consumption is low so I don't have to worry about battery drain if watching a movie and not hooked up to "shore power" or running the RV generator. Good unit for the money!

Reviews.Title: Programing issues but a really good buy.
Reviews.Author: Marie Koval
Reviews.Content: works out well in our RV. Can't say much about the TV part. we only have used it for DVD's.  The menu is difficult to use, but that could be because we were in the middle of no service. The darn thing wants to be programed before you can just pop in a DVD.  Otherwise I would have given a 5 Star. But for the aggravation it dropped to 3 :(

Reviews.Title: Happy I purchased this Television/DVD player.
Reviews.Author: Pen Name 20 "Pen Name 20"
Reviews.Content: I've owned this tv for 4 months and am very happy with it.  I was somewhat leery about buying an off brand but needed a multi functional tv for a small space in the kitchen.  After reading all of the reviews, I decided to take the plunge and I am glad I did.  Setup was simple, just about plugged it in and we were watching tv.  Nice picture and happy consumer.

Reviews.Title: Very bad tuner
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "comt"
Reviews.Content: Tested the digital tuner several times and could only receive 2 channels when 6 are available! My 32" tv gets 6 as well as an old adapter box gets 6 on the same antenna. The Axess TVD1801-15 will not work if you want over the air broadcasts.

Reviews.Title: So/so extra TV
Reviews.Author: Gale Slavin
Reviews.Content: I am somewhat disappointed in picture quality and sound.  Have not tried playing a DVD yet.  Set is very light in weight..

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: j perrin
Reviews.Content: There is no way to adjust the tint leaving you with "smurfs" or "pumpkin people". The sound is harsh no matter how you try to adjust it, and every time you change the channel you have to readjust the volume.I would not recommend this product and based on what I've experienced with this TV I would not purchase any other Axess products.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: B&C Humphries
Reviews.Content: I really like my tv I bought from you guys. its just the right size  for my camper.  thanks again

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more for a tv
Reviews.Author: chase grayson
Reviews.Content: This tv is horrible, spend 20 more bucks and get a better tv. If you move 5 ft away from directly on front of the tv you can't see what's going on on the screen. I would gladly pay S&H; to get my money back.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: Angela Falcone
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for the kitchen counter. Haven't had an issue with viewing the picture at various angles. Great picture. Sound is a little tinny, but that's to be expected with a tv this size. Haven't used the dvd player yet. Shipping was FAST and set was really easy. Buy it.

Reviews.Title: Just the ticket!
Reviews.Author: Arthur C.
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our RV travels and it is perfect!  Picture clarity is great.  Used the 12V, DVD, cable input features and all worked perfectly.  The sound is rather poor, as others have mentioned, and it is more apparent on some DVD's -- but it's nothing that we can't deal with.  For the price, you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: good color ,sound needs orked on.
Reviews.Author: Debra E. Smith
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this tv. Nice size for my camper. Good color quality. Only complaint is the sound quality. Not quite loud enough. Trouble hearing when heater fan is running.

Reviews.Title: Solid, versatile TV and multi-media player
Reviews.Author: Freedom Rich
Reviews.Content: I've used this product traveling, extensively, for over a month- in RV and car. Very portable. Have subjected it to vibration, dust, voltage fluctuations and much movement- with no problems. No reservations about buying another one. Watched numerous movies (DVD) and photos (JPEG) via SD card, from camera. Works great as a monitor for Apple laptop, via HDMI, which the instructions say cannot be done. Has withstood my roughness without a whimper, so far.Given this is a travel TV, it is just right in all-around quality. Some reviews say 'for the price, it's fine'. This infers cheapness. It is not a cheap unit with respect to quality. The price is nice, however, and the unit is very light-weight. The ports (plug-ins) were well planned, and include all you'll likely need. Plugs directly into (newer) car decks with auxiliary mini-jack, for excellent stereo sound. The screen view is good. There are optional picture settings and a user setting too- resolving most bright-light and low-light issues. Note that picture loses contrast, etc. when viewing at angle, from center. Screen is tilt-adjustable. There is a pause function, but no slow-motion. In a large RV, the screen is a bit small. In a car, it's pretty big. I have not used the TV function. The instructions are good enough.Plug in and play, instantly. All-around very good technology, and product.

Reviews.Title: Works as well as bigger, more expensive TVs
Reviews.Author: Thomas Wilson
Reviews.Content: It fits the space I wanted it in and works great.  Needed a unit for a small RV and this fills the bill well.  Works on car battery as well as house current and that was a requirement.

Reviews.Title: WARNING... Sound stops working after just a couple months worth of daily use
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth James
Reviews.Content: Right after the return period ended, the sound started sounding funny and within the day, the sound stopped working all together. I tried the headphone plug and not even the headphone plug works.I thought this was a good deal until I found out now I have to replace it. I should have gone with a brand name. Really bummed and will never buy an off brand TV from Amazon again. Amazon should guarantee electronic purchases more than their standard 45 days. Now all I have is a pretty doorstop.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: C. Reeves "Bargain Seeker"
Reviews.Content: I brought this TV for my husband.  He is a truck who travels overnight.  He loves the TV but the sound is not as great as it could be but the picture is beautiful.  Very clear.  Haven't used the DVD player as of yet but will come back to let you know how that does.  I would recommend this TV for anyone that was a decent set for a small room.

Reviews.Title: Great 15" TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about this TV......needed a small, narrow, TV for counter in kitchen and it is perfect.  Works great, good color, and has so many options for use.  Very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Mud "Oh"
Reviews.Content: It's a little bit bigger than a tablet.  Sits nice on the desk.  Does all it's suppose to do.  Fun.

Reviews.Title: Thad experience. With this access tv. Terrible
Reviews.Author: Gailouise
Reviews.Content: Less than a star. Sound was tinny and hurt my ears. The worse tv I ever bought. Nice size and feature.

Reviews.Title: Sharp set, put in my convertion van.
Reviews.Author: carl streeter
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great,  audio is sufficient in a quite room, Player works perfect. I have not hooked up an antenna as yet but plan to. about the wall mount , It is of good design however I did some modifications to make it work on the roof of my van. In a room .mounted on a wall, I'm sure it would be great.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: Raymond W. Wolters "Rayman"
Reviews.Content: If you have the means, don't buy this TV. I bought it as a little TV for my kids play area and for that its fine.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it unless you absolutely don't have room for a bigger set
Reviews.Author: James Tortorici
Reviews.Content: The screen resolution is not good at all.  The sound is the worst.  Like most LED sets, they're thinner but that also means the speakers are very thin.  Sound quality is lousy.  You save money on the price of the tv, but need to buy a $100 sound bar (which I won't do) to make it sound good.

Reviews.Title: dvd does not work
Reviews.Author: John Mudge
Reviews.Content: All seems ok  but dvd  will not go in slot. It acts like  something  is stuck  in there.  I ordered  it for the  dvd.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my Semi truck and it works awesome !!!! i use it all the time and i dont have any problems what so ever

Reviews.Title: Amazon is amazing!!
Reviews.Author: rebecca j neely
Reviews.Content: It was a lot smaller then I thought ! I actually needed one for my camper and it is gre3at for that! it was shipped to my home in days

Reviews.Title: TV for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: E. Revelle
Reviews.Content: Had a good TV mounted under the cabinets but it played out recently.  I knew I needed a replacement but there were not many available for under the cabinet mount.  I have not tried the DVD player as I really had no desire to even have one - maybe it will come in handy one day.  The TV is fine - the sound is not so great - very tinny - but it will be okay.  I certainly would not order this tv to use as our primary tv, as the sound and picture would not stand up to our demands in the family room.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Margo Conover
Reviews.Content: This TV worked fine and I used it exactly twice before it failed.  As over two months had passed since purchase, I couldn't return it.  And, yet, I also couldn't find any way to reach the manufacturer from the Owner's Manual, and their website isn't possible to access without a password.Amazon should quit carrying this piece of junk or, if they continue, offer warranty support.

Reviews.Title: Not happy!
Reviews.Author: mary Knoche
Reviews.Content: Not happy with it. The sound isn't clear some of the time and the pictures color is dark even with adjustments. I am really not pleased with it my other brand of TV was much better.You also have to be within 3-4 ft for  the controller to work. M Knoche Mo

Reviews.Title: Get a lot for your money.
Reviews.Author: Araz
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised.  Have it on my boat.  The size is perfect as you don't need (nor could you fit) a big screen in the cabin space.  And it stores easily in a cabinet when underway.  Picture does not have the highest quality graduation of tones as on the big, pricey sets.  (Seems a little too contrasty--but perhaps that can be adjusted, which I have not tried to do).  The DVD also works fine, though it does not 'remember' where you stopped (with a lecture series DVD I have tried), which is a little annoying.  It is extremely light weight, which is great for portability.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Karen Beaulac
Reviews.Content: I didn't expect the quality of $500-$800 tv so when I received it - I was amazed at the quality of the picture. I agree with others about the audio - it's not the greatest but for a tv near my pc - works perfect for me and takes up a lot less room than my old traditional little tv.

Reviews.Title: tv works just great.
Reviews.Author: kenny  griffith
Reviews.Content: I use the tv in my camper and it works just great just how I know it would .amazon is a great place to buy what you are looking for.

Reviews.Title: Axess TVD1801-15 15.4" LED AC/DC TV
Reviews.Author: Dale A. Meyn "Dale"
Reviews.Content: A good, cheap small TV for my camping trailer which runs on 12VDC, has built in DVD player and digital tuning. It works well, great picture, does everything I expected.  A good product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For Truck .... :)
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: I Installed two of these Axess TVD1801-15 15.4" LED AC/DC TV with DVD Player, Units into my truck for long trips and camping trips. Removed the base from bottom with a few screws and running off a 12 Volt system x2 with use of a 12 volt plug splitter and used a magnet mount digital tv antenna connected to a splitter then two coax cables to the tv's, Was able to pull in 32 digital stations. Although The digital signal is lost when driving and on when stopped is a bit annoying, Might be the type of antenna used I don't know,  have to figure it out, may need a signal booster box to pull stations in better while driving. Still it had a lot of I mean a lot of inputs for computers and my xbox and dvd's for on the road. I was a little upset to find out the USB port does not play movies or videos just pictures and mp3's. I went with the 15.4 inch model instead of the 13 inch because of a nicer screen size, not too big same size as seats, gets alot of looks from others seeing two of them glowing from the back seats. The speakers put out a decent loud sound level and is not distorted but treble, Has Earphone and PC Input jacks. The picture is HD and the picture is nice and sharp, not fuzzy or cheap looking and comes with a nice full sized remote control. Could not find any kind of mounting bracket for a 15 inch so I made a 2x2 nylon tie down straps with velcro sewed to straps and other velcro on back of tv's, works great and can move tvs from one vehicle to another easily. Altogether Very Happy With The Pair of Them!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Camp Trailer
Reviews.Author: Laura McNutt
Reviews.Content: We love this compact AD/DC TV.  It has a Great Picture and Sound for the size and money.  It is so easy to use.  The Built in DVD takes up less space and makes it a great little TV to store away in the Camp Trailer. Very energy efficient, we watched 2 movies back to back and it did'nt effect our battery life in the Camp Trailer.

Reviews.Title: great tv combo for the price
Reviews.Author: Kristina79
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with my purchase and does everything we need it for. Can't wait to take it camping.  Has a great picture and sound is clear.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality.
Reviews.Author: Mona E. Gualtieri
Reviews.Content: This product is the perfect example of why you shouldn't always go for the best price.  The picture quality is terrible.  I will be giving it to a charity and buying another brand.  Worst product I have ever bought on line.

Reviews.Title: Damaged
Reviews.Author: John L Rutan
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my camp trailer because it was 12 dc  and only drew about 2 amps.  I received it as 12/24/2013.  As I was out of town my wife checked the box and said it looked good with no damage.  We finally got to test the TV out when we went camping this 2/8/2014 and found the TV had two problems.  When i turned it on the screen had like a silver dollar size ink spot on the upper screen.  The second problem the DVD player would not play correctly.  It would start and stop and sounded like it was binding up.  I can't return it because I've had it to long even though I just now took it out of the box. My advice is do not buy anything if you can't full test it when you receive it. This thing probably got dropped in shipping and received internal damage.

Reviews.Title: TV is Awful .Failed immediately
Reviews.Author: Kenneth E. Cantrell
Reviews.Content: TV worked the first time I turned it on but then it never worked again. I couldn't be more disappointed with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Never buy from easy buyz
Reviews.Author: gilberto bryan jenkins
Reviews.Content: I buy this Tv and 8 and it reach to my place a 21 when the shipping it was suppose to be  from 3 to 8 day it takes 13 days to reach really upset on this buy... i will update how the tv preform as well...

ProductInfo.Features:
Sleek and loaded with features which include 1440 X 900 maximum resolution for sharp viewing experience, Dimensions: 14 3/4"W X 11 1/4"H (without the stand) and 14 3/4"W X 12 1/2"H (with stand), 16:9 aspect ratio, built-in digital and analog tuner to catch your favorite programs and 12V car cord technology for viewing on the go.  This 15.6" LED television with built in DVD player offers great performance and function in a well designed package.
Built in Digital and Analog Television Tuner, 12V Car Cord Technology, Multi-language On-Screen Display
USB Input Slot, HDMI Input, Input Terminal: Cable / Antenna RF, Audio/Video, VGA (Computer Monitor), PC Audio Jack, HDMI Input, USB Input, Earphone Audio Jack, Coaxial Output Jack, CVBS Input, S-Video Input
Full Function Remote Control, AC Power Adapter and 12V Car Cord, Power Supply DC12V / AC100-240V 50/60Hz, Heavy Duty 12-24V AC/DC Protection
Power Supply DC12V / AC100-240V 50/60Hz, Power Consumption in Operation: ≤24W, Power Consumption in Stand by: 1W
ProductInfo.Name: Axess TVD1801-15 15.6" LED AC/DC TV with DVD Player Full HD with HDMI, SD card reader and USB, ideal for home, office, cars, trucks, RVs and boats
